name: scroll-x-scroll-y
desc: Sets the definition for the graph's scroll-x/scroll-y object.  This will include a scroll bar within the chart on the defined scale axis.  Note "zooming":true and "zoom-to":[,] attributes must be set within the corresponding "scale-x" or "scale-y" object.

attrs.name: bar
attrs.desc: Allows you to style the scroll bar.  For more information on how to style the scroll bar, see bar.

attrs.name: handle
attrs.desc: Allows you to style the handle used for scrolling.  For more information on how to style the scroll handle, see handle.
